title: BBC’s Dracula Trailer: He Can Suck Our Blood Anytime
text:
Vampires, but make them seductive. Like, really seductive. Please allow Claes Bang to sexually challenge you in the first trailer for Dracula, the three-part BBC miniseries helmed by Sherlock alums Steven Moffat and Mark Gatiss. (Don’t worry, it’s coming to Netflix, too.) There’s blood oozing everywhere. A bunch of nuns holding stakes. Throbbing human flesh just waiting to be consumed by the Count himself. And … castles. Just a lot of sweet, sweet external castle shots. The series will follow our vampire “from his origins in Eastern Europe to his battles with Van Helsing’s descendent and beyond,” and, because we know you’re curious, there’s no Mrs. Dracula. It’ll premiere on Christmas in the U.K., but no word yet for us Anglophiles.
